text: order in review i this place from the front of the hotel and they recommended it highly i called to place my order for to my room they were very won soup nice and tender won chicken with and again fresh were used and good pieces of chicken crispy beef much like a beef nice of beef with a sweet sauce very tasty in garlic sauce came with was not over done all in all for this was really good i am used to going to authentic in this the spot and they also me a nice of because i like it hot
